name: World Invasion TD
description:
I made this game in order to learn how to make an upgrade system. I also had a lot of plans for it but hit a roadblock at some point so I put it on hold.

I may restart developing it again seeing as how I already have all the story written out and a couple of assets complete, but that is only after I finish my current project (a turn based RPG).

It currently has 3 fully playable levels (with place-holder graphics) and an upgrade system. Currently it is pretty fun to play so by all means you can try it out.

If you are curious, this is the final version of the turrets: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/world-invasion-td-turrets-showcase-fa803e7559324f46b1f996a482c8cd3e
